definition: lit. to nurture one's years (idiom)/fig. to enjoy one's later years
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
Zhou Dunyi (1017-1073), Song dynasty neo-Confucian scholar
to move the jaw/to munch/to masticate
to order with the chin/to indicate what one wants by facial gesture
variant of 夥頤|夥颐[huo3 yi2]
(literary) very many/wow! (an exclamation of surprise and admiration)
to chew on a large slab (idiom); a large mouthful is hard to chew/to tuck into a great meal
to take care of one's spirit and keep fit (idiom)
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy

sentences.english: Kuang Zhouyi has made the tremendous contribution on the theory of Ci.
sentences.chinese: 况周颐为我国的词学发展作出了巨大贡献。

sentences.english: No man is so old but think he may yet live another year.
sentences.chinese: 活到古稀想耄耋，活过耄耋望斯颐。

sentences.english: Rao Zongyi is one of the distinguished figures in the academic circle in the 20th century China.
sentences.chinese: 饶宗颐是20世纪中国学术史上的杰出人物之一。

sentences.english: With the development of our society: the cfirmus no longer is a wonderful "Ivory Tower".
sentences.chinese: 随着社会的前进，除颐皲舍园没有再是一个象牙塔。

sentences.english: Li Jianyi was a traditional Chinese physician with great achievements in modern times.
sentences.chinese: 李健颐是近现代医学史上一位颇有建树的中医学家。

sentences.english: we went to the summer palace and took some pictures.
sentences.chinese: 我们去颐以及园了并拍了一些照片。

sentences.english: It is a key to understand the Kuang Zhouyi's thinking of Ci.
sentences.chinese: 是理解况周颐词学理论的关键。

sentences.english: Kuang Zhouyi was an excellent writer and theoretician of Ci in Late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 况周颐是晚清重要词人和词学理论家。

sentences.english: Rao Zongyi was not just a sinologist.
sentences.chinese: 饶宗颐先生不光是一位国学大师。

sentences.english: Someone suggests going to the Summer Palace.

definition: to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)
clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
